title: The Case of the Not-So-Nice Nurse
description: When nurse Cherry Aimless lands in San Francisco in search of Nancy Clue and a flock of missing nuns, the earnest white-girl 1950s meet the oh-so-queer 1990s in a parody of both girl detective novels and lesbian romantic fiction. This latest edition has a new introduction by the author.
author: Mabel Maney
